Document: Please check in on our Elders The recent news about the Kamloops Residential School is horrific for us. But for ANY Elder who has attended any residential school, its triggering. Flooding back memories. Residential school survivors are triggered, even 60 years later
Name: 6_indigenousled_reconciliation_yukon_schools
Representative_Docs: ['To honor National Truth and Reconciliation Day, the Nisgaa Environmental Stewardship Society,  School District 92, plants 100 solar lights and listens to elders and Nisgaa governance talk about survival and thriving in the Nisgaa Nation. Truth and Reconciliation Day', 'My colleagues and I spent the last two days at St Eugenes meeting with Blackfoot Elders and learning about the impacts of residential schools. Last night we found out 182 unmarked graves had been found. A legacy of sorrow. Truth And Reconciliation', "215 children in Kamloops; 104 children in Brandon, Manitoba; 751 Children in Cowessess, Saskatchewan. Our Elders gave evidence to the Truth and Reconciliation Commission. Canada did not believe it. Now Canada has no choice but to act. Prayers up, we need them. Sometimes it's hard to be Indigenous TRC Calls To Action 71 to 76 No Denial"]
Top_n_words: indigenousled - reconciliation - yukon - schools - tribal - education - survivors - testimony - prayers - sunrises

Representative_Docs: ['To honor National Truth and Reconciliation Day, the Nisgaa Environmental Stewardship Society,  School District 92, plants 100 solar lights and listens to elders and Nisgaa governance talk about survival and thriving in the Nisgaa Nation. Last night we found out 182 unmarked graves had been found. A legacy of sorrow. Truth And Reconciliation', "215 children in Kamloops; 104 children in Brandon, Manitoba; 751 Children in Cowessess, Saskatchewan. Our Elders gave evidence to the Truth and Reconciliation Commission. Name: 6_indigenousled_reconciliation_yukon_schools
Representative_Docs: ['To honor National Truth and Reconciliation Day, the Nisgaa Environmental Stewardship Society,  School District 92, plants 100 solar lights and listens to elders and Nisgaa governance talk about survival and thriving in the Nisgaa Nation. Truth and Reconciliation Day', 'My colleagues and I spent the last two days at St Eugenes meeting with Blackfoot Elders and learning about the impacts of residential schools. Last night we found out 182 unmarked graves had been found. A legacy of sorrow. Truth And Reconciliation', "215 children in Kamloops; 104 children in Brandon, Manitoba; 751 Children in Cowessess, Saskatchewan. Our Elders gave evidence to the Truth and Reconciliation Commission. Canada did not believe it. Now Canada has no choice but to act. Prayers up, we need them. Sometimes it's hard to be Indigenous TRC Calls To Action 71 to 76 No Denial"]

Document: All show and no go, as one of the elders back home called me.
Name: 7_cinema_movie_film_theatre
Representative_Docs: ['When seven cash drop seniors decide to outsource their retirement to a resort in far off India friendships and romance blossom in the most unexpected ways. I would be interested to know if you can guess this gem of a movie.', "Not really, your premise but the tweet reminded me so here is a random recommendation. It's about an elderly man who gets really satisfying revenge on a group of shitty brats who shoot his old dog for no reason. Amazing film too and there is a cameo from Freddy Krueger.", 'Walter | Milton Film Festival 2022 . The short film Walter is a bittersweet short bio of an elderly man who spends loads of time at the cinema watching his favorite movie, La La Land. The main characters remind him of his long deceased girlfriend']
